content: Do you have a schedule of the dates when 6.100B microquizzes will be held?  I'm on the women's basketball team and especially in November and early December could possibly have a conflict or two with departures for away games.  We have our final schedule for basketball, and I just wanted to let the teaching staff know of any makeups I will need in advance.  Thanks!
subject: 6.100B Schedule

content: I'll post the schedule sometime next week!
Ok sounds good, thank you!  I will try and let you know of any conflicts as soon as the schedule is up!
The schedule can be accessed at this link: https://sicp-s1.mit.edu/fall22?course=0002
